China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 2 月 8 日星期四 04:10:54 GMT 120
China stocks extend bounce on regulatory change-of-guardBeaten-up Chinese stocks were set for a fourth day of gain on Thursday after a change of leadership at the market regulator, shoring up expectation of further support measures as China heads into a long Lunar New Year holiday this week. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 03:04:04 GMT BNTWYL75QFLVTOQZYLTT36NLX4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-stocks-extend-bounce-regulatory-change-of-guard-2024-02-08/Rae Wee世界中国
Hillhouse Investment acquires Singapore's InCorp GlobalSingapore-headquartered corporate solutions and business advisory firm InCorp Global said on Thursday it has been acquired by global alternative investment firm Hillhouse Investment. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 02:58:33 GMT 6ISJMMOP6BJLFHVYTRA34BXBHE https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/hillhouse-investment-acquires-singapore-incorp-global-2024-02-08/Reuters市场交易
Asian shares track Wall Street higher; China deflation risks persistMost Asian markets tracked Wall Street higher on Thursday, but Chinese stocks were battling to sustain a rally after data raised concerns about deflationary pressures in China and suggested the economic slowdown may have further to run. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 02:28:01 GMT 3ARYVRE36RKS5JWUYFTP4VWABA https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-02-08/Stella Qiu市场
China's consumer prices suffer biggest fall since 2009 as deflation risks stalk economyChina's consumer prices suffered their steepest fall in more than 14 years in January while producer prices also dropped, ramping up pressure on policymakers to do more to revive an economy low on confidence and facing deflationary risks. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 02:18:10 GMT 2YTIS754CREAMQHFTE6GJGYCGJ54 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-consumer-prices-suffer-steepest-fall-since-2009-deflation-risks-stalk-2024-02-08/Qiaoyi Li, Ryan Woo世界中国
China's consumer prices fall 0.8% y/y, factory deflation persistsChina's consumer prices extended their decline for a fourth month in January while producer prices also dropped, underscoring deflationary risks facing the world's second-biggest economy as it struggles to mount a solid recovery. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 01:43:13 GMT KVJIQM6BLNMJ3EBQBDXRGQGCJE https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-consumer-price-fall-08-yy-factory-deflation-persists-2024-02-08/Reuters世界中国
China says Messi's absence in Hong Kong match beyond 'realm of sports' as fury buildsChinese state media, Hong Kong politicians and fans swiftly condemned Argentine player Lionel Messi's participation in a Japan match on Wednesday after staying on the bench just days earlier in a highly anticipated match in Hong Kong. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 01:22:10 GMT PWGI77D5TNO77ETSXYVRII6PY4 https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/china-says-messis-absence-hong-kong-match-beyond-realm-sports-fury-builds-2024-02-08/Reuters运动的足球
Guatemala's foreign ministry reaffirms ties with TaiwanGuatemala on Wednesday said it reaffirmed its ties with Taiwan, days after its foreign minister told Reuters the government would seek official trade ties with China while maintaining relations with Taiwan, which China claims as a province. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 01:20:54 GMT ZDCVOJV7PVMYJAIUJCFMVNG2OQ https://www.reuters.com/world/guatemalas-foreign-ministry-reaffirms-ties-with-taiwan-2024-02-08/Reuters世界
For China's new globetrotters, group tours are out and Northern Lights are inYuwei Zhangzou represents a new type of Chinese tourist. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 01:11:01 GMT XUVSGOSC4VMAVLX5M5B3XAT2BA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-new-globetrotters-group-tours-are-out-northern-lights-are-2024-02-08/Casey Hall, Sophie Yu世界中国
PNG leader Marape tells Australia economic growth brings securityPapua New Guinea Prime Minister James Marape told Australia's parliament on Thursday his nation's economic growth would make Australia more secure, adding that nothing would come between the two neighbours. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 00:39:08 GMT CV7DNKSGK5L5LEPP7P7MTWLUUU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/png-leader-marape-tells-australia-economic-growth-brings-security-2024-02-08/Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
Dollar oscillates on less dovish Fed comments; yuan steady after inflation dataThe U.S. dollar was trading in a tight range on Thursday as traders digested less dovish remarks from policymakers overnight and looked ahead to fresh economic data from the United States. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 00:31:09 GMT JIJB33SESBICDJOIDP45NWT5ZM https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/dollar-oscillates-less-dovish-fed-comments-china-inflation-data-awaited-2024-02-08/Brigid Riley市场货币
China bid to 'cheat' its way to chip prominence failing -Taiwan's US envoyChina has sought to "cheat" and "steal" its way to matching Taiwan in chip technology, but has yet to succeed despite investing huge sums, Taiwan's de facto ambassador to Washington said on Wednesday, while holding out the prospect of more Taiwanese semiconductor investment in the U.S. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 23:05:02 GMT XO5OMXJ2UBO3PE2VJR6GRMALJ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china-bid-cheat-its-way-chip-prominence-failing-taiwan-to-send-us-2024-02-07/Michael Martina, David Brunnstrom世界
